title: Without a Trace
overview: Claudia Clarke is a good cop with the perfect life. Until one day when her life changes forever when her father, with whom she has a close relationship with, vanishes. Now it is up to Claudia to seek out the truth about her father's disappearance. What Claudia soon discovers though is that things are not always what they seem, especially when adult film stars, an ex-girlfriend and peer pressure are involved. As the puzzle pieces begin to come together, Claudia realizes that she may be in deeper than she had planned. But Claudia is willing to risk it all just to find her father who has disappeared…without a trace.
